name: Don't Touch My Toy's
description:
Welcome to this great, fun game!

The baby doesn't like when we touch his Toy's,
So that's exactly what we gone do.
Play fast and don't let the toy's fall to the floor!
Watch out – the toys get more complicated to catch!
Avoid the fire, but drink the bottle for power up.
Advance to the different rooms, and get the Bonus to make things go slower – or faster.

Good luck!
